sent.orig: Tough times never last, tough people do. Tough people stick it out.
sent.trans: 艰难的岁月不会没完没了，坚韧的人会始终不懈，坚持到底。

sent.orig: Kraft has a tough, tough, wear and tear is not easy to break.
sent.trans: 牛皮纸具有质地刚健单弱、韧性好、耐磨亏、不便当撕破断裂等弊端。

sent.orig: I'm sharing mine because it has helped me achieve some tough goals in some tough times.
sent.trans: 我愿意把我的宣言与人分享，原因在于：它在一些艰难的时刻帮我实际了目标。

sent.orig: He sucks, very unclear, tough TA's, tough pop-quizzes, and not an easy A at all.

sent.orig: IT WAS a tough speech for tough times.
sent.trans: 艰难时期造就硬汉演说。
